roleset.name: bring into prominence

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The Machinists rejected a proposal featuring a 10 % base wage increase over the life of the three - year contract , plus bonuses of 8 % the first year and 3 % the second .

propbank.arg: a 10 % base wage increase over the life of the three - year contract , plus bonuses of 8 % the first year and 3 % the second

example.name: with location argument
example.text: The characters will also be featured in a new public service effort for the United Way .

propbank.arg: in a new public service effort for the United Way

roleset.note: FEATURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'feature' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison. (from feature.01-v predicate notes)
